summary: REQ-14 asked to re-run build/deployment with no code changes. The diff includes repository changes (a new trigger file and modifications to tracking/summary files), which violates the "no source files are modified" acceptance criterion. Additionally, the diff references substantial frontend behavior changes and architecture changes that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Trigger a fresh build and deployment of the current project without making any code changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows repository modifications (added and modified files). This conflicts with the requirement/AC that no source files are modified as part of the request, and it does not provide evidence of an actual pipeline re-run or deployment attempt/result (only code/file changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a rebuild trigger marker file in the repo to force a pipeline run.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 explicitly requires triggering a build/deployment without making code changes; adding a new file is a code/repo change and was not requested as a feature/implementation detail.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend application changes (new Valentine/troll finale sequence, styling changes, and removing InternetIdentityProvider/auth) implied via updated summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints and non-goals prohibit introducing new features or code changes; these are unrelated functional/architecture changes beyond re-running build/deploy.
